item.title: 奥地利 RHI Magnesita 公司将收购美国氧化铝生产商 Resco 公司
item.description: 总部位于维也纳的耐火材料制造商 RHI Magnesita 计划收购美国氧化铝和耐火材料生产商 Resco Group，两家公司表示，收购的企业价值最高可达 4.3 亿美元。【原文：Vienna-based fireproof materials maker RHI Magnesita plans to buy Resco Group, a U.S.-based producer of alumina and refractories for an enterprise value of up to $430 million, the companies said.】

item.title: 反对派赢得大选后土耳其股市攀升，里拉处于低位
item.description: 土耳其反对党在地方选举中大胜总统塔伊普-埃尔多安领导的 AK 党（AKP），土耳其股市周一上涨，里拉兑美元汇率在创下历史新低后小幅走软。【原文：Turkish stocks rose on Monday and the lira weakened slightly after hitting its record low against the dollar after the political opposition logged a thumping victory over President Tayyip Erdogan's AK Party (AKP) in local elections.】

item.title: 俄罗斯股市创两年多来新高
item.description: 周一，俄罗斯基准股指升至自 2022 年 2 月俄罗斯出兵乌克兰以来的最高点，卢布兑美元汇率小幅走强。【原文：Russia's benchmark stock index strengthened to its highest point since the day Russia sent its troops into Ukraine in February 2022 on Monday, while the rouble firmed slightly against the U.S. dollar.】

item.title: 通胀走软迹象增强降息希望，期货上涨
item.description: 美国股指期货周一上涨，因为最新公布的通胀数据显示消费者价格趋缓，这增强了美联储提前降息的希望。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Monday after the latest inflation print showed moderating consumer prices, bolstering hopes of an early interest rate cut by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: UPS 将成为美国邮政的主要航空货运供应商
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司周一表示，经过一段过渡期后，该公司将成为美国邮政服务公司（USPS）的主要航空货运供应商。【原文：United Parcel Service will become the United Stated Postal Service's (USPS) primary air cargo provider, after a transition period, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 第一季度对比特币的关注掩盖了美国 ETF 格局的扩大
item.description: 第一季度，现货比特币交易所交易基金（ETF）的诞生和对人工智能新投资方式的探索盖过了更广泛的ETF市场的其他趋势，但分析师们表示，单一国家ETF和债券ETF等其他主题可能会在2024年之前持续发酵。【原文：The birth of spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) and the quest for new ways to invest in the artificial intelligence overshadowed other trends in the broader ETF market in the first quarter, but analysts say other themes like single-country ETFs and bond ETFs are likely to play out through 2024.】

item.title: 美国信贷需求旺盛推动第二季度经济增长
item.description: 投资者争相在美联储降息前锁定收益，预计这将使美国企业债券市场的涨势持续到第二季度，一位策略师称，这可能会触及三十年来从未见过的水平。【原文：An investor scramble to lock in returns before the Federal Reserve cuts rates is expected to sustain a rally in the U.S. corporate bond market into the second quarter, with one strategist saying it may touch levels not seen in three decades.】

item.title: 聚焦：马斯克声誉下降，特斯拉潜在买家嗤之以鼻
item.description: 市场情报公司 Caliber 的一项调查显示，美国特斯拉的潜在购买者队伍正在缩小。【原文：The ranks of would-be Tesla buyers in the United States are shrinking, according to a survey by market intelligence firm Caliber, which attributed the drop in part to CEO Elon Musk's polarizing persona.】

item.title: 早间竞标制造业拉开就业周序幕
item.description: 阿曼达-库珀（Amanda Cooper）对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Amanda Cooper.】

item.title: 俄罗斯 Baltika 公司起诉嘉士伯子公司，要求赔偿损失 9 亿多美元
item.description: 俄罗斯法院的文件显示，俄罗斯巴尔蒂卡啤酒公司（Baltika Breweries）起诉了嘉士伯的四家子公司，要求赔偿损失 62.4 亿丹麦克朗（约合 9.0219 亿美元），双方正在为俄罗斯最大啤酒制造商的未来而争论不休。【原文：Russia's Baltika Breweries has sued four Carlsberg subsidiaries for damages amounting to 6.24 billion Danish crowns ($902.19 million), Russian court filings showed, as the two parties fight over the future of Russia's largest brewer.】

item.title: 中国超预期的经济数据为官员赢得了解决问题的时间
item.description: 分析师们表示，中国 18.6 万亿美元的经济已规避了近期指标所显示的一些下行风险，这为中国官员赢得了更多时间来说服投资者，他们可以在 2024 年及未来几年启动新的增长引擎。【原文：China's $18.6 trillion economy has skirted some near-term downside risks as suggested by recent indicators, analysts said, buying officials more time to convince investors they can fire up a new growth engine for 2024 and the years ahead.】

item.title: 特斯拉将美国 Model Y 汽车价格提高 1000 美元
item.description: 据特斯拉网站报道，特斯拉周一将美国所有 Model Y 汽车的价格提高了 1000 美元。【原文：Tesla on Monday raised prices for all Model Y cars in the United States by $1,000, according to its website.】

item.title: 独家报道反垄断审查：微软将在全球范围内拆分 Teams 和 Office
item.description: 美国科技巨头微软公司周一表示，将在全球范围内把其聊天和视频应用 Teams 与 Office 产品分开销售，而此前六个月，微软曾在欧洲拆分了这两款产品，以避免可能遭到欧盟的反垄断罚款。【原文：Microsoft will sell its chat and video app Teams separately from its Office product globally, the U.S. tech giant said on Monday, six months after it unbundled the two products in Europe in a bid to avert a possible EU antitrust fine.】

item.title: 调查显示，中国新房价格以逾两年半的最快速度上涨
item.description: 周一的一项民间调查显示，受一系列扶持受危机影响的房地产行业的措施推动，3月份中国新房价格创下两年半以来的最快涨幅。【原文：New home prices in China rose at the fastest pace in more than two and a half years in March versus a month earlier, a private survey showed on Monday, driven by a slew of supportive steps to prop up the crisis-hit property sector.】

item.title: 乐天集团宣布整合银行和金融科技部门的计划
item.description: 乐天集团周一表示，计划将其银行、信用卡和其他金融科技业务整合为一个集团。【原文：Rakuten Group said on Monday it planned to integrate its bank, credit card and other fintech businesses into one group.】

item.title: 中国股市跳涨，日本股市下跌，日元逼近干预区间
item.description: 周一，在全球经济普遍乐观的背景下，中国股市领涨亚洲大部分地区，但日本股市下跌，日元汇率被压制在令交易商警惕货币干预的水平附近。【原文：Chinese shares led a rally around most of Asia on Monday amid a broadly optimistic global economic backdrop, but Japanese shares tumbled with the yen pinned near levels that have traders on guard for a currency intervention.】

item.title: 中国奇瑞为其最畅销的内燃机车型提供减税和补贴政策
item.description: 奇瑞汽车公司（CHERY.UL）周一宣布，将为其部分畅销内燃机车型提供购置税减免、以旧换新补贴和汽车金融折扣，因为在全球最大的汽车市场，残酷的价格战正在肆虐。【原文：Chery (CHERY.UL) announced Monday that it would offer purchase tax breaks, trade-in subsidies and auto finance discounts for some of its best-selling combustion models, as a cutthroat price war rages in the world's largest auto market.】

item.title: 中国批评美国收紧芯片出口规则
item.description: 中国对美国收紧半导体出口规则提出了批评，称其为贸易设置了更多障碍，给芯片行业带来了更多不确定性。【原文：China has criticised the tightening of U.S. rules on semiconductor exports, saying they have created more hurdles to trade and more uncertainty in the chip industry.】

item.title: 全球经济 亚洲工厂疲软令中国经济反弹黯然失色
item.description: 周一的调查显示，由于国内需求不振拖累经济增长，尽管中国经济出现反弹，但亚洲许多经济体的工厂活动在3月份仍有所减弱，这给一度快速扩张的全球经济主要驱动力的前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Factory activity in many Asia economies weakened in March despite a rebound in China as lacklustre domestic demand dragged on growth, surveys showed on Monday, clouding the outlook for a once fast-expanding, key driver of the global economy.】

item.title: 应用显示，小米电动汽车的买家需要等待长达七个月的时间才能买到车
item.description: 周一，小米公司的应用程序显示，该公司正告知新款 SU7 电动轿车的潜在买家，他们可能需要等待长达七个月的时间，这表明中国电子产品制造商对其汽车的需求十分强劲。【原文：Xiaomi is advising would-be buyers of its new SU7 electric sedan that they could face an up to seven-month wait, its app showed on Monday, in a sign that the Chinese electronics maker is enjoying strong demand for its vehicle.】

item.title: 中国南方航空公司开通北京至澳门的首条航线
item.description: 中国三大国有航空公司之一的中国南方航空公司周一开通了北京至澳门的首条航线。【原文：China Southern Airlines, one of China's three state carriers, on Monday launched its first flight between Beijing and Macau.】

item.title: 世界银行下调泰国今年 GDP 增长预期至 2.8
item.description: 世界银行周一表示，泰国今年的经济增长率预计为 2.8%，到 2025 年将加快至 3.0%。【原文：Thailand's economic growth is expected at 2.8% this year before accelerating to 3.0% in 2025, the World Bank said on Monday.】

item.title: 财新PMI显示，中国工厂活动以13个月来最快速度扩张
item.description: 周一的一项民间调查显示，受国内外客户新订单增长的推动，3月份中国制造业活动以13个月来最快的速度扩张，企业信心创下11个月来的新高。【原文：China's manufacturing activity expanded at the fastest pace in 13 months in March, with business confidence hitting an 11-month high, driven by growing new orders from customers at home and abroad, a private survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 日本央行称汇市 "投机 "行为影响日元走势
item.description: 日本财务大臣铃木俊一周一表示，货币市场上出现了一些投机性走势，这些走势并不反映经济基本面，铃木俊一重申了他对日元过度下跌的警告。【原文：Japanese Finance Minister Shunichi Suzuki said on Monday there were some speculative moves in the currency market that did not reflect economic fundamentals, repeating his warning against excessive yen declines.】

item.title: 美元持稳，PCE 数据为 6 月降息押注埋下伏笔；日元成为关注焦点
item.description: 美元周一基本持稳，因为显示美国物价宽松的数据增强了对美联储可能在6月降息的押注，而日元在1美元兑152日元附近徘徊，使交易商对干预威胁保持紧张。【原文：The dollar was broadly steady on Monday as data showing easing U.S. prices bolstered bets that the Federal Reserve could cut interest rates in June, while the yen loitered near 152 per dollar keeping traders on edge on the threat of intervention.】

item.title: 投资者押注供应收紧，石油保持涨势
item.description: 由于预期欧佩克+减产将导致供应收紧、俄罗斯炼油厂遭到袭击以及中国制造业数据向好，油价周一小幅下跌，守住了近期的大部分涨幅。【原文：Oil prices edged down slightly on Monday, holding on to most of their recent gains amid expectations of tighter supply from OPEC+ cuts, attacks on Russian refineries and upbeat Chinese manufacturing data.】

item.title: 韩国采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，受国内需求疲软拖累，韩国 3 月份工厂活动萎缩
item.description: 周一的一项私营部门调查显示，由于国内需求放缓抵消了海外销售的强劲势头，韩国 3 月份的制造业活动有所减弱。【原文：South Korea's manufacturing activity weakened in March as slowing domestic demand offset robust overseas sales, a private-sector survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: PMI 显示，日本 3 月份工厂活动萎缩速度放缓
item.description: 周一的一项私营部门调查显示，日本 3 月份的工厂活动连续第 10 个月出现萎缩，但由于产出和订单的萎缩幅度放缓，萎缩程度为 4 个月来最低。【原文：Japan's factory activity in March contracted for the 10th consecutive month though the downturn was the least pronounced in four months, helped by softer contractions in output and orders, a private-sector survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 韩国 3 月出口因芯片销售连续第六个月增长，但不及预期
item.description: 周一的数据显示，对韩国芯片的强劲需求帮助亚洲第四大经济体在 3 月份实现了连续第六个月的出口增长，尽管增速略低于预期。【原文：Robust demand for South Korean chips helped Asia's fourth-largest economy post export growth for a sixth consecutive month in March, albeit at a pace slightly slower than expected, data showed on Monday.】

item.title: 日本服务业景气上升至三十多年来最高水平
item.description: 日本央行密切关注的一项调查显示，日本大型非制造业企业的商业景气在第一季度改善到了三十多年来的最高点，这为决策者带来了国内需求将支撑脆弱经济复苏的希望。【原文：Business sentiment among big Japanese non-manufacturers improved to a more than three-decade high in the first quarter, a closely watched central bank survey showed, offering policymakers hope that domestic demand will underpin a fragile economic recovery.】
